Name: Levant
Review Text: A Turkish Restaurant in the canal side with a seasoned chef organizing mezes, starters and main courses in a good fashion. Nothing like a kebab or doner place. It's much more cosy and upper in terms of taste and service quality. Definitely a go again place.

Name: Levant
Review Text:
See the picture.
Delicious Turkish food and breathtaking view, as well as friendly service!

Name: Levant
Review Text:
I was craving Turkish food and made reservations here. There is a terrace on the canal, but due to the weather we sat inside. Very pretty place.
They bring by a tray with vegetable and seafood mezzes. We selected three, all ‚Ä¶

Name: Levant
Review Text: A fantastic Turkish experience with excellent tapas, wine, and food. Highly recommend it to anyone craving a Turkish restaurant that comes in at a reasonable price for what you get, which is a lot.

Name: Levant
Review Text: Very good Turkish food, nice staff and lovely ambiance.

Name: Levant
Review Text: Loved it! We did not had main courses, only went with couple of mezes and appetizers accompanied with Turkish Rakƒ±, it was all perfect!

Name: Levant
Review Text: Great restaurant location, excellent food quality very tasty.

Name: Levant
Review Text: Great restaurant, the owner allowed us to sit in after kitchen closed. Food was delicious.

Name: Levant
Review Text: For me the best Turkish restaurant in Amsterdam with a very nice combination of menu with both fish & meat and starters. We have been there several times so far and never disappointed! Both inside and terrace are perfect depending on the weather. Definitely suggest Ali Nazik with beef and ciger as a hot starter.

Name: Levant
Review Text: For me the best Turkish restaurant in Amsterdam with a very nice combination of menu of both fish & meat and starters. We have been there several times so far and never disappointed! Both inside and terrace are perfect depending on the weather. Definitely suggest Ali nazik with beef and ciger as a hot starter.

Name: Levant
Review Text: Gracious hosts and wonderful food. Sea bass with spinach was great! $$$ but very good.

Name: Levant
Review Text: Very good food, friendly and helpful staff. The lamb is a great.

Name: Levant
Review Text: Beautiful, and somewhat hidden, Turkish gem! Delicious food and friendly staff. Highly recommend!

Name: Levant
Review Text: Good Turkish mezes/food and raki. Atmosphere was cozy and staff was friendly.

Name: Levant
Review Text: Top quality Turkish cuisine.

Name: Levant
Review Text:
Wonderful food very friendly and knowledgeable staff from kitchen right through to the service and beyond.
Terrific selection of wines and unusual very tasty water. Try not to eat to much ‚Ä¶

Name: Levant
Review Text: Great meal. Fine choice of mezze, literally, they are brought for you to choose from. We enjoyed both the lamb shoulder and duck breast with fruit as mains. Generous portions but just squeezed a dessert in. Service with a smile! Turkish Rose (dry) wasn't bad either. Wines may be a bit above average in price though.

Name: Levant
Review Text: Great place, delicious food, excellent service, romantic atmosphere

Name: Levant
Review Text:
We visited this restaurant on 20th June 2020 ,We order chicken and lamb dished .The food was ok nothing really special about it
We wanted to order prawns from menu but it was over . The terrace setting is ‚Ä¶

Name: Levant
Review Text:
Levant Reastaurant in Amsterdam might be the best place for excellent taste of the Turkish cuisine even compared with many 5* restaurants in Turkey!
You don't have to believe me: just go there on an evening and be yourself the judge of your own taste!

Name: Levant
Review Text: Good-hearted people: I forgot my apple airpods pro, and after 1 hour realised it. They had kept them aside for me- really honest staff, genuinely kind! I had a few starters and the lamb main course- excellent food on top of a great service! Will be back and very thankful!

Name: Levant
Review Text: Everything so fresh and delicious service is also so nice staff so friendly also owner always there it‚Äôs a big difference makes ...

Name: Levant
Review Text: What can I say, high-class Turkish cuisine, at an affordable price. However, perhaps a better explanation of meze appetizer prices would be needed. For the rest, the undisputed quality of the food, especially the fish, in a very particular location for a gallant dinner, a stone's throw from the Museumplein.

Name: Levant
Review Text: Stopped here for a beer, great service

Name: Levant
Review Text: We went there on a Saturday night back in March. Food was amazing it was so good especially the starters I recommend the feast so you taste everything. I would suggest you go on an empty stomach tho ;) they will feed you well!! Service was great and the atmosphere so enjoyable! Recommended best Lebanese I ever had hand down üôè

Name: Levant
Review Text: Nice place with caring staff. The second time I went here they even remembered my diet!

Name: Levant
Review Text: Excellent service with an authentic food to match. The owner is very welcoming and caring for his patrons, rest of the staff is pleasant as well. The atmosphere is very relaxed, in the summer the terrace facing the canal is the place to sit, and in the winter it is warm and cozy inside.

Name: Levant
Review Text: Great atmosphere, great service, great food! We had the lamb, beef tenderloin, and lamb steak. For an appetizer we had tuna, hummus, and tzatziki. Everything was excellent! My 20 month old son had a meltdown and the staff couldn't have been more understanding or accomodating. Highly recommend!

Name: Levant
Review Text: Good restaurant with kind people. The starters (mezze) were delicious, very good Tzatziki and fresh baguette. The main course was very nice. The meat was cooked perfectly and in combination with the pesto did it taste very good. ‚Ä¶

Name: Levant
Review Text:
One of my favourite restaurant in Amsterdam, I really liked the way they serve their starters and main dishes.
Friendly staff, delicious food with decent prices.
Recommended!!!

Name: Levant
Review Text: Definitely one of the best Turkish restaurants I have ever been to

Name: Levant
Review Text: Nice, cozy restaurant. Good selections of Turkish raki. Decent turkish meze and good value/price. However don't expect too many options that u normally can find in Turkey. Very friendly staff. I recommend here, especially if u have guests.

Name: Levant
Review Text: Excellent place for a fine Turkish meal in Amsterdam! Extensive choices of mezze made fresh everyday. Good wine list. Main courses were awesome as well. Highly recommended!

Name: Levant
Review Text: Excellent service, great variety, comfortable setting.  Lots of choices in this area, but this stood out for us.  Try the local plate for an appetizer.  Excellent blonde beer on tap.

Name: Levant
Review Text: Better than the ones in Turkey. Amazing canal view with very calm atmosphere. Great food and great Turkish hospitality of the staff make you feel more than happy. :)

Name: Levant
Review Text: We tried this latest addition to the Flat White empire and really enjoyed it. Snuggled between two other eateries on lovely old Saddler Street this is a cool place for a light lunch or just a quick snack and a hot beverage. The stripped back decor is in keeping with the Flat White oeuvre yet the place is warm and cosy.

Name: Levant
Review Text: Food is delicious here. If you are visiting the restaurant in a warm day, you will love the backyard which is in front of the canal. Staff is a bit rude I can say. If the place is a bit crowded they have problem of stress management.

Name: Levant
Review Text: Really friendly, waiter was super accommodating and helpful, lovely food, and a fantastic terrace hidden away out back overlooking a canal. Had a great birthday evening with grandparents and kids.

Name: Levant
Review Text: Beautiful terrace right on the canal. We enjoyed our dinner here. Recommend getting a few different mezze plates - portions are on the smaller side

Name: Levant
Review Text: Altijd goed eten! A most amazing restaurant.  For years we have eaten here. Food always excellent,  service, and atmosphere is great.

Name: Levant
Review Text:
Expensive for what it is and the waiter is very pushy to sell more which is not great seeing the price of the dishes already quite high.
A good example of the poor quality are the toilets which are very dirty and half broken. Not worth the price

Name: Levant
Review Text: Absolutely amazing food and diverse menu, very noble setup and atmosphere. Staff could have been a little more welcoming or proactive.

Name: Levant

Name: Levant
